Package Nim

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Player
    An interface that represents a player in the game of Nim.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DumbComputer
    A computer that is a selectable player in the game of Nim (not a very smart player)
    HumanPlayer
    A player that is controlled by the user in the game of Nim (can have multiple human players)
    Nim
    An ancient game in which there are two players and a pile of marbles (from 10 to 100) and players must take turns and pick from 1 to n/2 marbles; the player to pick up the last marble loses
    NimTester  
    Pile
    Creates a pile of marbles for the game of Nim
    SmartComputer
    An computer that is a selectable player in the game of Nim (a very intelligent player!)
